bhramanchal wrote:
> testSave(com.abcinc.phonelist.test.mock.TestSaveAction)java.lang.LinkageError:
> loader constraints violated when linking org/xml/sax/XMLReader class

Please either go to the JUnit FAQ (search the web for it) or read 
Chapter 8 of _JUnit Recipes_. It is a class loading problem that we hope 
to address in JUnit 4.0.
